title: Regenerative Efficiency
description: Detects when systems reduce waste and stress by prioritizing openness, durability, and shared memory over erasure-driven obfuscation.
indicators: Use of durable, repairable hardware designed for long lifespans
Open data and memory practices that eliminate redundant erasure cycles
Reduction in user stress/anxiety through clarity and transparency
System design that lowers total energy/material footprint via commons-oriented sharing
